title: MedUnifier: Unifying Vision-and-Language Pre-training on Medical Data with Vision Generation Task using Discrete Visual Representations
details: Z Zhang, Y Yu, Y Chen, X Yang, SY Yeo - arXiv preprint arXiv:2503.01019, 2025
abstract: Despite significant progress in Vision-Language Pre-training (VLP), current approaches predominantly emphasize feature extraction and cross-modal comprehension, with limited attention to generating or transforming visual content …
